price: Bisa Asomafoᴐ no a Yԑsomaa wᴐn maa wᴐdii w’anim kan no sε: “Yɛfirii Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene no akyi yεε anyame bi maa wͻn sε wͻnsom wͻn anaa?
arabic: وَسۡـَٔلۡ مَنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَآ أَجَعَلۡنَا مِن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ءَالِهَةٗ يُعۡبَدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wasal man arsalnā min qablika min rusulinā ajaʿalnā min dūni al-raḥmāni ālihatan yuʿ'badūna
